featured.text: The “Cups and Balls” trick has been performed for about 1,700 years.
The “Cups and Balls” trick which he was particularly good at is still performed by magicians all over the world today.

definition.zh_def: 球體，通常是圓形的物體，可以用於運動或遊戲。
definition.en_def: Spherical objects, often used in sports or games.
definition.example: The children played with colorful balls in the park.
